About the Package ================================ KVM (for Kernel-based Virtual Machine) is a full virtualization solution for Linux on x86 hardware containing virtualization extensions (Intel VT or AMD-V). It consists of a loadable kernel module, kvm.ko, that provides the core virtualization infrastructure and a processor specific module, kvm-intel.ko or kvm-amd.ko. Using KVM, one can run multiple virtual machines running unmodified Linux or Windows images. Each virtual machine has private virtualized hardware: a network card, disk, graphics adapter, etc.
=Supported versions= QEMU emulator version 2.2.0 =Setup= The Agent must be installed on KVM enabled machine. =Setup= * API version and https port can be configured in this VARA based on your environment. =Common Inputs= (None) =Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.CLONE_VM * Action Description: Clone a VM from an existing VM.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.LIST_VMS * Action Description: List VMs from an existing VM.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_VM * Action Description: Delete VM from existing VM.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.GET_VM_INFO * Action Description: Retrieves VM information.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.REBOOT_VM * Action Description: Reboot VM from existing VMs.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_VM * Action Description: Create a new VM.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.RESET_VM * Action Description: Reset a vm immediately without any guest shutdown.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.START_VM * Action Description: Start a guest domain, either from the last managedsave state, or via a fresh boot if no managedsave state is present.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_NETWORK * Action Description: Creates a network, using settings from an XML file.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.LIST_NETWORKS * Action Description: Lists the virtual networks libvirt is aware of, along with basic status and autostart information.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.STOP_VM * Action Description: Stop a VM.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.GET_NETWORK_INFO * Action Description: Displays basic information for a virtual network.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.SAVE_VM_TO_FILE * Action Description: Saves a running domain ( RAM , but not disk state) to a state file.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.RESTORE_VM_FROM_FILE * Action Description: Restores a VM (domain) from provided source file.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.SHUTDOWN_VM * Action Description: Gracefully shuts down a domain.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.START_NETWORK * Action Description: Starts an inactive, previously defined, virtual network.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.RESUME_VM * Action Description: Moves a VM out of the suspended state.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.ACTION.SUSPEND_VM * Action Description: Suspend a running VM.
